"Bunny Time-Travelers" - Create a group of bunnies who use their unique abilities to travel through time and solve historical mysteries.
"Bunny Adventure旅行社" - Develop a旅行社 for bunnies that offers exciting adventures through different eras of history.
"Bunny Detectives" - Create a team of bunnies who work together to solve crimes in different time periods.
"Bunny Historical Tourist Guide" - Hire bunnies as tour guides for historical sites, allowing visitors to experience history through the eyes of these curious creatures.
"Bunny Time-Traveler's Handbook" - Write a guidebook on how to become a successful time-traveling bunny, including tips on traveling safely and exploring different eras of history.
